cause.description:
turn of every light you dont need, unplug all electronic devices at night, dont keep them on standby... avoid useless car trips, turn of the aircondition if its possible, live as close to nature as you can... try to reduce the amount of garbage that you and your family produce...eat fresh food, so you dont have to throw away the packaging, etc.... you can find many way to help nature... plant a tree...and dont cut one
1. lamps on roads must have a device that makes them on, only when a car passes...its very useless to have all those roads lighted and they are empty
2. they must ban all cars that has big engines...its useless
3. life will no longer be like it was...unless we wake up
